first_para: Andrew McCulloch Love (born 21 March 1949) is a British Labour Co-operative politician who was Member of Parliament (MP) for Edmonton from 1997 to 2015, winning in 2010 with 53.7% of the vote.

full.extract: Andrew McCulloch Love (born 21 March 1949) is a British Labour Co-operative politician who was Member of Parliament (MP) for Edmonton from 1997 to 2015, winning in 2010 with 53.7% of the vote.
full.title: Andy Love
